name: Control To Lander
description:
Your lander has landed on the moon! Try to collect rock samples before you run out of fuel, or needing to bail out. You'll be out of control while the rover is out of the contact window, but will continue to execute commands.

Notes:

Game has 1 level. Game design is loosely used, due to the directness of commands.
